lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Presently, the FHLBB cannot afford to close failing institiutions "because we can't afford it with the current FSLIC fund," she said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With the elimination in 1983 of regulations that had drawn strict lines between savings and loans and commercial banks, the gap widened to as much as 50 to 75 basis points as wary depositors demanded a higher premium to place their funds in thrift institutions, Fairbanks said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Depositor confidence is also eroded by the existence of thrifts that are failing but manage to stay in business by paying deposit rates well above prevailing market rates.

lst.name: sentence
